The making of the game

Congrats! here's a behind the scenes of the making of Magic Mines!

This game was made in 48 hours. That's the amount of time i gave myself.

Originally Magic Mines was going to be a text adventure... then i remembered the requirement. So... i got to work on a Non-Euclidean  action RPG.

12 hours in and i needed a snack break (idk why i put this in.)

24 hours later i tested it (yes i was timing myself XD) and it actually felt pretty good.

36 hours and i had the full prototype done! (I still had work to do tho :p)

48 hours later and all things where done. There are still little glitches and bugs that i wanted to fix but a timers a timer.

Thanks for playing! Comment for a chapter two!
